markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Scuttle Up](/Feats.aspx?ID=3968) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 43</row>

**Prerequisites**
[Athamasi](/Heritages.aspx?ID=211) heritage or [Xyloshi](/Heritages.aspx?ID=215) heritage

</column>

---

Your environment requires you to climb cave walls or tree trunks with great regularity. You gain a [Climb](/Actions.aspx?ID=33) speed of 10 feet.
name: Scuttle Up
